meanings.definition: A type of sweet dessert made from egg whites and sugar.
meanings.sent1: I baked some delicious merengues for the party.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells a variety of merengues for customers to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kids had a merengue-eating contest at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as light and sweet as a fluffy merengue.
meanings.sent5: The colorful merengues on the dessert table tempted everyone at the event.

meanings.definition: A style of music and dance originating in the Dominican Republic.
meanings.sent1: The energetic merengues filled the dance floor with joy.
meanings.sent2: People in the Dominican Republic love to dance to merengues.
meanings.sent3: The merengue music made even the shyest person tap their feet.
meanings.sent4: The rhythm of the merengue was like a heartbeat pulsing through the room.
meanings.sent5: The merengues at the festival had everyone moving to the lively beat.

meanings.definition: A type of cookie or confection made with meringue.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's homemade merengues always melt in your mouth.
meanings.sent2: The bakery's display case was full of colorful merengues.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they decorated the merengues with sprinkles.
meanings.sent4: The sweet aroma of freshly baked merengues filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The delicate merengues were a hit at the tea party.
